name: NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType
desc: These constants determine whether apps launched by remote notifications display a badge.

items.name: static var badge: NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app should display a badge.

items.name: static var sound: NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app should play a sound.

items.name: static var alert: NSApplication.RemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app should display an alert.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a new remote notifications options structure.
